    DeleteRectangle(Vector3, Vector3, Vector3)

    Deletes a rectangle for the given corner points from the grid.

    Declaration

    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    UnityEngine.Vector3 corner1

    Corner1.
    UnityEngine.Vector3 corner2

    Corner2.
    UnityEngine.Vector3 offset

    Offset.
    Remarks

    Handles given corners well, without assumption of which corner is positioned where. Do not worry.
